about_the_game:
RocketPool is the ultimate mash-up of pool and rocketry! Grab your friends for a fast-paced, local-multiplayer party game where the classic rules of pool meet the chaotic fun of rocket-powered cue balls.

Simple Controls, Explosive Fun
Aim, boost, and pocket your balls first in this high-energy twist on pool. Use your rocket to outmanoeuvre your opponents and claim victory.

Realistic Details, Chaotic Gameplay
Feel the burn literally as your rockets scorch the table felt. Watch sparks fly and smoke trail as your cue ball rockets across the table in stunning detail.

Classic Gameplay, Modern Twist
Compete with up to four players in a nostalgic last-century bar setting, brought to life with a chalkboard aesthetic. Whether you're aiming for precision or chaos, there's always room for skilful play and hilarious moments.

Get in the Game Early
Try the free demo, available in February. Play Classic mode for free and look forward to more game modes and features soon!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Core i3-8100 or Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 750, Iris Xe or Radeon 740M with at least 1GB of VRAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p 60fps Low Settings - FSR 50%
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Core i5-8400 or Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1070
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 4k 60fps Ultra Settings

short_description: RocketPool is a casual, local-multiplayer party game where each player controls a rocket-powered cue ball to pocket their balls first. It's pool... with rockets!
